pdf_extraction.title: Smart PDF Data Extraction
pdf_extraction.description: Our system can automatically extract data from your PDF invoices and orders to save time on data entry.
steps: Upload a clear, text-based PDF (scanned images may not work well)
Wait for the system to process and extract data
Review and verify the extracted information
Make any necessary corrections before saving
tips: PDFs with clear text work best
Ensure the PDF contains structured data (invoices, orders, etc.)
Processing may take a few seconds depending on document complexity
